name: Inc-APE-Able
description:
Play this arcade game where you are a drunk monkey from a Caribbean island terrorising the beach. 

Gain points by destroying everything in your path and Collect funky hats for all the power ups.

How to Play: 

Download the Inc-APE-able.zip file. Read the READ ME file. 

  • Movement - WSAD / Directional Keys 
  • Smash - Spacebar

Where to play:

  • Game Maker Studios approved  device
  • Game Maker Studios application
  • A browser
